name: Battle for Tinor (Julien G)
description:
Hey,

This game was mostly made within 48h for the GMTK GameJam. The theme was "Out of Control". In this game, you must win an intense battle, however you cannot control you units like a traditional RTS game.

You may only hire leaders every 20 seconds. Choose wisely because they are the ones that dictate the strategies being used.

Good luck !

Units Mage

Heals allies and lightly damages enemies around him. Excels when supporting other units.

Swordman

Strong and fast, swordmen are at their best when striking alongside a few allies.

Bowman

Can deal great damage from a distance.
